title: 2-Day Classic Venice
description: Perfect introduction to Venice covering all the iconic landmarks and must-see attractions.

stops.name: St. Mark's Basilica
stops.description: Start your Venice journey at this stunning Byzantine cathedral
stops.tips: Book tickets online. Visit early morning to avoid crowds.

stops.name: Doge's Palace
stops.description: Explore the Gothic palace and cross the Bridge of Sighs
stops.tips: Combined ticket with St. Mark's saves money.

stops.name: Rialto Bridge
stops.description: Walk across the iconic bridge and explore the market
stops.tips: Best photos from the nearby streets, not on the bridge itself.

stops.name: Grand Canal Gondola
stops.description: Classic gondola ride through Venice's main waterway
stops.tips: Negotiate price beforehand. Sunset rides are magical but pricier.

title: Hidden Venice Walk
description: Escape the crowds and discover Venice's secret corners, local haunts, and hidden treasures.

stops.name: Scala Contarini del Bovolo
stops.description: Hidden spiral staircase with panoramic views
stops.tips: Tucked in a quiet courtyard. Look for small signs.

stops.name: Libreria Acqua Alta
stops.description: Unique bookshop with books in bathtubs and gondolas
stops.tips: Don't miss the book staircase in the back courtyard.

stops.name: Osteria Al Squero
stops.description: Authentic bacaro for cicchetti and spritz by the canal
stops.tips: Stand outside by the gondola workshop. Cash only.

stops.name: Cannaregio District
stops.description: Wander through the authentic residential neighborhood
stops.tips: Get lost intentionally. Some of Venice's best moments are unplanned.

title: Romantic Evening Venice
description: A magical evening route perfect for couples, featuring sunset views, intimate dining, and moonlit strolls.

stops.name: Accademia Bridge
stops.description: Watch the sunset over the Grand Canal
stops.tips: Arrive 30 minutes before sunset. Can get crowded.

stops.name: Trattoria Al Gazzettino
stops.description: Intimate dinner at a family-run restaurant
stops.tips: Reserve ahead. Ask for a quiet table.

stops.name: Evening Gondola Ride
stops.tips: Evening rides are less crowded and more romantic.

stops.name: St. Mark's Square
stops.description: End with live music at the illuminated square
stops.tips: Cafés have live orchestras. Worth the price for the ambiance.

title: Foodie's Venice
description: A delicious journey through Venice's culinary scene, from traditional bacari to fresh seafood markets.

stops.name: Rialto Market
stops.description: Start with fresh seafood at the historic market
stops.tips: Open mornings only. Tuesday-Saturday. Closes around 1 PM.

stops.name: Cantina Do Spade
stops.description: Historic bacaro for cicchetti and wine
stops.tips: Try the baccalà mantecato and polpette.

stops.name: Osteria Al Squero
stops.description: Authentic cicchetti by the gondola workshop
stops.tips: Order multiple small plates. Perfect spritz here.

stops.name: Gelateria Nico
stops.description: Finish with artisan gelato by the canal
stops.tips: Try the gianduiotto. Enjoy sitting by the water.

title: Islands Hopping
description: Explore Venice's beautiful surrounding islands: Murano, Burano, and Torcello.

stops.name: Murano
stops.description: Visit glass factories and watch artisans at work
stops.tips: Free glass-blowing demonstrations. Shop prices are negotiable.

stops.name: Burano
stops.description: Photograph colorful houses and enjoy seafood lunch
stops.tips: Best photos in morning light. Try the risotto de gò.

stops.name: Torcello
stops.description: Visit the ancient Cathedral of Santa Maria Assunta
stops.tips: Much quieter than other islands. Bring water and snacks.
